perk.name: Iron Club
perk.description_key: Learn to upgrade your wooden Club to a iron melee club

perk.name: Spiked Club
perk.description_key: Learn to apply spikes to your bats on the Wood Working Bench with a Claw Hammer

perk.name: Steel Spiked Club
perk.description_key: Learn to upgrade your spiked club using steel spikes on the metal working bench

perk.name: kaBar
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a kaBar Knife on the anvile using a claw hammer and learn how to craft the Small Knife Blade in the forge using the anvil that you need to craft it. This is a small strong knife thats good for fighting.

perk.name: Machete
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Machete on the anvile using a claw hammer and learn how to craft the Large Knife Blade in the forge using the anvil that you need to craft it. This is a long strong knife thats good for fighting.

perk.name: The Shark
perk.description_key: Learn to craft this awesome knife TheShark on the anvile using a claw hammer and learn how to craft the Large Knife Blade in the forge using the anvil that you need to craft it. This is a big strong knife thats best at fighting.

perk.name: Katana
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a mighty Katana on the anvile using a claw hammer and learn how to craft the Sword Blade in the Blast Furnace that you need to craft it. This is a lomg Sharp sword thats best at cutting things off.

perk.name: Magnum Scope Attachment
perk.description_key: Learn to attach sniper scopes to Magnums on the metal working bench using a wrench

perk.name: Pistol Silencer Attachment
perk.description_key: Learn to attach Silencers to Pistols on the metal working bench using a wrench.

perk.name: Blunderbuss
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a make shift firearm and ammo. /nLevel 2 - Learn how to conect two Blunderbusses to make a double barrel version

perk.name: Slug
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Shotgun Slugs with a bullet press

perk.name: Rifle Scope Attachment
perk.description_key: Learn to attach sniper scopes to Huntingrifeles on the metal working bench using a wrench.

perk.name: Rifle Silencer Attachment
perk.description_key: Learn to attach Silencers to Hunting Rifles on the metal working bench using a wrench.

perk.name: AK47 Scope Attachment
perk.description_key: Learn to attach sniper scopes to AK47s on the metal working bench using a wrench.

perk.name: AK47 Silencer Attachment
perk.description_key: Learn to attach Silencers to AK47s on the metal working bench using a wrench.

perk.name: Stone Spear
perk.description_key: Learn to harden a basic Wood Spear in the campfire and throwable Javelin

perk.name: Iron Spear
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft an Iron Spear head in the forge and craft a spear and throwable Javelin with it

perk.name: Electric Spear
perk.description_key: Learn to Craft a Electric Spear on the metal working bench with the compact driver.

perk.name: Crossbow
perk.description_key: Learn to build and disassemble a simple Crossbow, crafting its parts on the wood working bench using a wrench

perk.name: Wood Working Bench
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Wood Working Bench. Use it to craft more complex items and faster. The wood working bench has 3 tools - CircularSaw, claw Hammer and wrench.

perk.name: Fan Belt
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Fan Belt on the wood working bench

perk.name: Forge
perk.description_key: Learn to craft and use a forge

perk.name: Anvil
perk.description_key: Learn to craft an anvil in a forge

perk.name: Forged Iron
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a small stone Forge. Use it to smelt iron, brass, lead, glass, stone and clay. The Forge has 3 tools - anvil, calipers and tool And Die Set.

perk.name: Short Metal Pipe
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Short Metal Pipes like a man with your bare hands

perk.name: Blast Furnace
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a large brick Blast Furnace. Use it to smelt steel, iron, coal and clay. Use this to forge steel.

perk.name: Forged Steel
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Forged Steel in the blast Furnace

perk.name: Short Steel Pipe
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Short Steel Pipe like a man with your bare hands

perk.name: Steel Tools
perk.description_key: Learn to forge Steel tool heads in the Blast furnace and craft steel tools on the the metal working bench.

perk.name: metalWorkbench
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Metal Working Bench to craft more metal items and faster

perk.name: spotlight
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a working spotlight on the metal work bench using the Compact Driver.

perk.name: Barbed Wire
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Barbed Wire in the forge using a anvil

perk.name: Small Bed
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Small Bed on the Metal Work Bench using a wrench. When rested on it will heal and warm you

perk.name: Cement Mixer
perk.description_key: Lean to craft a cement mixer on the wood working bench using a wrench. use it to make cement, concrete mix and other terrain blocks

perk.name: Concrete Mix
perk.description_key: Learn to craft concrete mix in the cement mixer

perk.name: Cement
perk.description_key: Learn to craft cement in the forge

perk.name: Cobblestones
perk.description_key: Learn to craft cobblestones

perk.name: Refinery
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a refinery on the wood working bench using a wrench. Use it to creat gas, oil and other chemicals

perk.name: Bio Fuel
perk.description_key: Learn to process Bio Fuel in a refinery

perk.name: Oil
perk.description_key: Learn to process oil in a refinery

perk.name: Gasoline
perk.description_key: Learn to process Gasoline in a refinery

perk.name: Wrench
perk.description_key: Learn to repair the wrench and craft it on a anvil using a claw hammer.

perk.name: Claw Hammer
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a hammer head in the forge and how to build and repair a claw hammer

perk.name: Screwdriver
perk.description_key: Learn to craft and repair a screwdriver

perk.name: Stone Drill
perk.description_key: Learn to build and maintain a Stone drill that is cappable of digging hardstone and metals

perk.name: Animal Hide Armor
perk.description_key: Learn to craft basic animal hide clothing on the armor table using a Leather Needle.

perk.name: Leather Armor
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Leather Armor on the armor table using a Leather Needle.

perk.name: Scrap Iron Armor
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Scrap Iron Armor on the armor table using a claw hammer.

perk.name: Iron Armor
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Iron Armor on the armor table using a anvil.

perk.name: Steel Armor
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Steel Armor on the armor table using a Wielder.

perk.name: Light Attachment
perk.description_key: Learn to attach flashlights to helmets on the armor table

crafting_skill.name: Primitive Crafting
crafting_skill.description_key: Crafting simple items faster and at better quality. Decrease repair penalties and use fewer repair items. Gain skill by crafting and repairing items from this group. Recipe unlock levels 2/3/5/5/50

perk.name: Wooden Ladder
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a wooden ladder

perk.name: Logcabin
perk.description_key: Learn to build basic Logcabin Blocks

perk.name: Plank
perk.description_key: Learn to cut basic wood Planks

perk.name: Nail
perk.description_key: Learn to craft basic Nail in the forge

perk.name: Chest
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a secure storage container

perk.name: Redwood Building
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Redwood blocks on the wood working bench using a CircularSaw

perk.name: Wood Building
perk.description_key: Learn to craft basic wood frames on the wood working bench. use them to build and upgrade wooden blocks

perk.name: Wooden Door
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a secure Wooden Door

perk.name: Wood Hatch
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a secure Wooden Hatche

perk.name: Wooden Bridges
perk.description_key: Learn to craft secure Wooden bridges on the wood working bench using a claw hammer

perk.name: Wooden Gates
perk.description_key: Learn to craft secure Wooden gates on the wood working bench using a claw hammer

perk.name: Wooden Shutters
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Wooden shutters on the wood working bench using a claw hammer

perk.name: Storage
perk.description_key: Learn to craft labeled secure storage containers

perk.name: Cobble Building
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Cobblestone blocks on the wood working bench using a CircularSaw

crafting_skill.name: Journeyman Crafting
crafting_skill.description_key: Crafting intermediate items faster and at better quality. Decrease repair penalties and use fewer repair items. Gain skill by crafting and repairing items from this group

perk.name: Iron Tools
perk.description_key: Learn to forge Iron tool heads in the Forge with a Anvil and use them to craft Iron tools

perk.name: Scrap Iron Building
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Scrap Iron Blocks on the metal work bench using a wrench

perk.name: Nuts and Bolts
perk.description_key: Learn to craft basic Nuts and Bolts in the forge using calipers

perk.name: Metal Ladder
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Metal Ladder on the Metal Working Bench

perk.name: Iron Hatch
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Iron Hatches on the metal working bench using a wrench

perk.name: Door Knob
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Door Knobs in the forge using calipers

perk.name: Scrap Iron Gates
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Iron Doors on the metal working bench using a Wielder

perk.name: Scrap Iron Shutters
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Iron Doors on the metal working bench using a Wielder

perk.name: Iron Door
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Iron Doors on the metal working bench using a wrench

perk.name: Iron Gun Safe
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Iron Gun Safe on the metal working bench using a wrench

perk.name: Concrete Building
perk.description_key: Learn to craft rebar frames in the forge using a anvil and use them to build Concrete Blocks

perk.name: CraftedGenerator
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Small Generator on the wood working bench using a wrench. Use it to power traps, lights and work benches

perk.name: Iron Trussing
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Iron Trussing in the forge using a anvil

perk.name: Concrete Draw Bridge
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a concrete draw bridge on the metal working bench using the Wielder

perk.name: MethaneProducer
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Methane gas producer on the metal working bench and use it to craft methane gas bombs.

perk.name: Small Elevator
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a small elevator on the metal working bench using a Compact Driver

perk.name: Steel Building
perk.description_key: Learn to craft steel frames in the blast furnace and use them to build steel blocks

perk.name: Steel Vault Hatch
perk.description_key: Learn to craft steel Vault Hatches on the metal working bench using the wielder

perk.name: Steel Rolling Garage Door
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Steel Vault Doors on the metal working bench using the CompactDriver.

perk.name: Steel Vault Door
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Steel Vault Doors on the metal working bench using the Wielder

perk.name: Steel Gun Safe
perk.description_key: Learn to craft The Steel Gun Safe on the metal work bench using the Wielder. these are the strongest secure storage container you can make

perk.name: LargeGenerator
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Large Generator on the metal working bench using the Wielder. Use it to power traps, lights and work benches more effeicently.

perk.name: Chemistry Station
perk.description_key: Learn to craft achemistry Station on the wood working bench using a claw hammer. Use it to craft complex chemical and medical items. The Chemistry Station has 2 tools - Mortar And Pestle and beaker.

perk.name: Aloe Cream
perk.description_key: Learn to craft healing creams

perk.name: First Aid Bandage
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a First Aid Bandage

perk.name: Gun Powder
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Gun Powder on the chemistry station using the Mortar And Pestle

perk.name: Pipe Bomb
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Pipe Bombs on the wood working bench

perk.name: Candy Tin Mine
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Candy Tin Mine on the wood working bench using a wrench

perk.name: Hubcap Mine
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Hubcap Mine on the wood working bench using a wrench

perk.name: Air Filter Mine
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Air Filter Mine on the metal working bench using a wrench

perk.name: Dynamite
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Dynamite and TNT on the chemistry station. These explosives will destroy hardstone

perk.name: Grain Alcohol
perk.description_key: Learn to distill Grain Alcohol in the still

perk.name: Iron Arrows
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Iron Arrow heads in the forge using an anvil and crossbow bolts

perk.name: Steel Arrows
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Steel Arrows and crossbow bolts on the metal work bench

perk.name: Carbon Arrow
perk.description_key: Learn to craft strong powerful Carbon Arrow on the metal work bench

perk.name: Flaming Arrows
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Flaming Arrows at the wood work bench

perk.name: Exploding Crossbow Bolts
perk.description_key: Learn to craft powerful Exploding Crossbow Bolts at the wood work bench

perk.name: Weapon Repair
perk.description_key: Learn to craft weapon repair kits

perk.name: Silencer
perk.description_key: Learn to build a Silencer on the metal work bench

perk.name: Bullet Casing
perk.description_key: Learn to craft brass into bullet Casing with the chemistry set

perk.name: Hot Lead
perk.description_key: Learn to smelt lead into bullet tips and buck shot in the forge

perk.name: Bullet Press
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft your very own bullet press on the metal work bench

perk.name: Asphalt
perk.description_key: Learn to make asphalt in a mixer. use it to make traveling easier

perk.name: Blood Draw Kit
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a Blood Draw Kit with the Chemistry set

perk.description_key: Learn advanced a first aid kit

perk.description_key: Learn to craft cooking equipment in the forge

perk.name: Purification Tablets
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Purification Tablets to clean water on the go

perk.description_key: Learn to brew healthy GoldenRod Tea on the campfire

perk.name: Garage Door

perk.description_key: Learn to craft more a Draw Bridge on the metal work bench Bench using a wrench

perk.description_key: Learn to craft more a Draw Bridge on the metal work bench Bench

perk.name: Electric Lights
perk.description_key: Learn to craft working electric lights on the Metal Work Bench

perk.description_key: Learn to craft Wooden Spikes

perk.description_key: Learn to craft Steel Spikes on the metal working bench

perk.name: Razor Wire

perk.name: Farming
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a seed nursery that will allow you to cultivate basic seeds from plants

action_skill.name: Hunting
action_skill.description_key: Learn to craft better Hunting knifes to harvest more and better animal parts.Gain skill by harvesting dead animal carcasses with hunting and field knives

perk.name: Hunters Kinfe
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a hunting Knife on the anvile using a claw hammer and learn how to craft the Small Knife Blade in the forge using the anvil that you need to craft it. This is a sharpe knife that will harvest more and better animal parts. Harvesting animals with this knife will increase your hunting skill

perk.name: Field Kinfe
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Field Knife on the anvile using a claw hammer and learn how to craft the Small Knife Blade in the forge using the anvil that you need to craft it. This is a very sharpe knife that will harvest the most and best animal parts. Harvesting animals with this knife will increase your hunting skill

perk.name: Animal Bags
perk.description_key: Learn to craft and use cloth a Animal bag to catch wild poisonous animals like spiders snakes and scorpions. You can then place them as traps for your enemies

perk.name: Chicken Coop
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a chicken coop and use it to hatch and raise a chicken. Once fully grown it will produce feathers or eggs and can be slaughtered for meat.

action_skill.name: Heavy Guns
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with Heavy Guns. Gain skill by using items from this group
